items.headline: U.S. stock futures inch higher following Trump-Putin summit; Wall Street awaits Fed’s Jackson Hole meeting
items.summary_en: U.S. stock-market futures rose slightly Sunday, after Friday’s summit between U.S. and Russian leaders ended without a major breakthrough and as investors await this week’s Fed gathering in Jackson Hole, Wyo.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I’m a senior who barely survives on $1,300 a month. No way could I live on $1,000.
items.summary_en: “We seniors are pressured and scammed into buying a lot of things we don’t need.”

items.headline: ‘I’m tired of corporate America’: My wife and I have $1.65 million. I’m 61. Can I retire already?

items.headline: ‘I am a senior citizen’: My car needs $3,500 for repairs, but only has a trade-in value of $6,000. Do I bother fixing it?
items.summary_en: “What is the ‘tipping point’ for keeping one’s old car versus trading it in?”

items.headline: How safe are cruise-ship water slides? A recent incident on a Royal Caribbean sailing raises concerns.
items.summary_en: The slides are an increasingly popular attraction on many of the mega vessels operated by cruise lines.

items.headline: Investors are plowing into homebuilder stocks. Will Jackson Hole prove them wrong?

items.headline: Walmart and rivals report earnings, for the clearest look yet at tariffs’ impact on consumers. Will CEOs talk about the elephant in the room?
items.summary_en: The nation’s biggest retailer reports results on Thursday as signs emerge that U.S. tariffs could be nudging prices higher.

items.headline: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $11 million. We’re not leaving it to our kids. Is that wrong?

items.headline: My aunt barely spends any money. Will we receive the contents of her safe-deposit box when she dies?
items.summary_en: “I am asking for my mom, who is on a fixed income. It would be a nice boon.”

items.headline: ‘I’ve been kept in poverty’: Do I take a $70K job at 74 and lose my Section 8 housing allowance?
items.summary_en: “After the age of 50, I really only had sporadic contract work and I had to sell my house.”
